name: Hydrogen Wellness Inhalation Unit
short_description: Flagship home unit for simple, daily wellness routines.
description: A molecular hydrogen wellness unit intended for general wellness use and education. No medical claims are made. Always follow the included safety instructions and local regulations.
highlights: Designed for a simple daily routine

faq.a: Safety depends on concentration, device design, ventilation, and correct use. Always follow device instructions and use in a well-ventilated environment. If you have a medical condition, consult a qualified clinician before use.
No. This product is sold for general wellness use and education. We do not claim to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
